    I say, if your knees aren’t green by the end of the day, you ought to seriously re-examine your life

    Bill Watterson — Calvin and Hobbes

    Chaitanya is interested in the emergence of complex phenomena across scales of organisation.

    This is a personal website. For further details about the group he is leading at the Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Biology, follow the T-Eco-Evo link on the left.
